title: Litro says prices of gas not increased
body_lines: Chairman of Litro Gas Lanka Ltd Theshara Jayasinghe said today that the company has not taken any decision as yet to increase the prices of litro gas.

Responding to several reports that some dealers in many parts of the country have haphazardly increased the prices of litro gas cylinders from last night, the Chairman however told the Daily Mirror that prices were not increased.
It is reported that some dealers are selling a 12.5kg gas cylinder at Rs. 4,200 after litro's competitor laugfs have  increased their prices.
Mr. Jayasinghe said that anyone charging more is considered illegal.(Darshana Sanjeewa Balasuriya)
